  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer diagram of a CHP station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübergangsdiagramm einer CHP Station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de transfert d'énergie d'une station de
CHP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama de transferência de energia de uma 
estação de CHP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema di trasferimento di energia di una stazione 
di CHP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα ενεργειακής μεταφοράς ενός σταθμού CHP</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de la transferencia de energía de una 
estación de CHP</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These energy transfer diagrams compare the amount of wasted thermal energy in a normal power station and a combined heat and power station.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">CHP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">power stations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wasted thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Energieübergangsdiagramme vergleichen die 
Menge der vergeudeten thermischen Energie in einem normalen Kraftwerk 
und in einer kombinierten Hitze und in einem Kraftwerk.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes de transfert d'énergie comparent 
la quantité d'énergie thermique gaspillée dans une centrale 
électrique normale et une centrale du chaleur et électrique 
combinée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de transferência de energia 
comparam a quantidade de energia térmica desperdiçada em uma 
estação de potência normal e em uma estação combinada do calor e 
de potência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi di trasferimento di energia 
confrontano la quantità di energia termica sprecata in una centrale 
elettrica normale ed in un calore ed in una centrale elettrica uniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα ενεργειακής μεταφοράς συγκρίνουν 
το ποσό σπαταλημένης θερμικής ενέργειας σε έναν κανονικό σταθμό
παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος και έναν συνδυασμένο σταθμό 
θερμότητας και παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas de la transferencia de energía 
comparan la cantidad de energía termal perdida en una central 
eléctrica normal y un calor y una central eléctrica combinados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CHP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftwerke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vergeudete thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CHP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CHP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transferência de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estações de potência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia térmica desperdiçada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica sprecata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CHP</string>
          </keyword>
